Text.val: A1. Check if REC must be created
A2. Check if there is already a REPA row added for REC
If a REPA row was stored in A3 then submit BXA343 with parameter REPA_JOURNALNO
B1. Check if REF must be created
B2. Check if there is already a REPA row added for REF
If a REPA row was stored in B3 then submit BXA344 with parameter REPA_JOURNALNO
